content.AnimalShop.1: Ah... an extra large futan bear! It's so plush it can hardly stop from toppling over.
content.AnimalShop.2: Ah... an extra large futan bear! It's so plush it can hardly stop from toppling over.
content.AnimalShop.4: The little family is gathered around the dinner table. Wait... except Grandpa. He's wedged under the bed for some reason.
content.AnimalShop.5: The little family is gathered around the dinner table. Wait... except Grandpa. He's wedged under the bed for some reason.
content.AnimalShop.6: You rummage through Marnie's dresser. It's mostly long dresses, but there's a pair of brown suspenders in here as well.
content.AnimalShop.7: You dig around in Marnie's private drawer. There's nothing of interest.
content.AnimalShop.8: Looks like he's using the radio as an alarm clock.
content.AnimalShop.9: Jack-in-the-box is sprawled out, his arms bent at grotesque angles. His hollow eyes peer coldly into the distance.
content.AnimalShop.10: It's a Mega Station. There's a game in it, but it's routed through a Code Sultan XL. Looks like someone's been cheating.
content.ArchaeologyHouse.1: A History of The Gotoro Empire
content.ArchaeologyHouse.2: Is War With The Gotoro Empire Necessary? A Unique Perspective by P.W.Kranzhauer
content.ArchaeologyHouse.4: A Geological History Of Stardew Valley
content.ArchaeologyHouse.9: Let's visit the farm. The chickens go bock bock. The pigs go snort snort. The goats go mah mah.#The ducks go ack ack. The rabbits go sniff sniff. The cows go ooh ooh.
content.BathHouse_MensLocker.2: Trying to shower with your clothes on?
content.Blacksmith.1: There's a tape inside 'The Essential Blues Collection, vol. 2
content.Blacksmith.2: You rifle through Clint's personal effects. There's a stack of blacksmith aprons, some magazines, an old sword, and a nice picture of his mother.
content.Blacksmith.3: You rifle through Clint's personal effects. There's a stack of blacksmith aprons, some magazines, an old sword, and a nice picture of his mother.
content.Blacksmith.4: Dear Emily,^I know you only think of me as a friend.^It's my fault. I'm too shy. I'll never have the courage to tell you the truth.^That's why I'm writing this letter to myself that I'll certainly crumple up and toss in the corner.

content.Blacksmith.6: àʛ¹àµÒËÅÍÁ ÃÐĔºȑÍÍÒƚ¾ ÁÍ§àˢÒä»˴Ò¹ã¹ Ȥ³¨Ðàʫ¹âÅËÐ ËÅÍÁÅÐÅÒÂ áÅÐıÒĥ§ɦ¡λ¹.
content.Club.1: Welwick: It's not my lucky day. Ugh... I drank too much.
content.Club.2: Man: Hey, can't you see I'm busy? I'm on a roll here.
content.ElliottHouse.2: Elliott's work desk. It's covered in notes and crumpled papers.
content.ElliottHouse.4: It looks like Elliott is trying to grow a bonsai tree. It looks cool so far!
content.ElliottHouse.5: It's a mini-palm, imported from Calico Desert.
content.ElliottHouse.6: It looks like Elliott is trying to grow a bonsai tree. It looks cool so far!
content.FishShop.1: It leads up to a little sleeping cubby. It's off limits
content.FishShop.2: It's a tackle box. It's full of lures, bobbers, hooks, and fishing line.
content.FishShop.4: There's little pink shrimping moving around in there.
content.FishShop.5: Well, it's a bin full of writhing, wriggling worms. It smells something awful.
content.HaleyHouse.2: You quickly peek into Haley's private dresser. It's stuffed with clothes.
content.HaleyHouse.3: You quickly peek into Haley's private dresser. It's stuffed with clothes.
content.HaleyHouse.6: There's a little note on the pot. 'Something to remember me by. -Sandy'
content.HaleyHouse.7: It's a bolt of blue cloth. There's pieces cut out of it, and little embroidered patterns along the fringe.
content.HaleyHouse.8: It's Emily's computer. It's password-protected so you can't snoop around on it.
content.HaleyHouse.9: 'Found Fashions: Photos From The Streets Of Zuzu City'
content.HaleyHouse.10: It's a deluxe vanity. There's all kinds of creams, paints, and powders dotting the surface.
content.HaleyHouse.12: 'Flailing With Purpose: A Modern Approach To The Art Of Dance'
content.HaleyHouse.14: It's a globe. Hey, there's Stardew Valley!
content.HaleyHouse.15: The oven smells sweet like fresh cupcakes.
content.HaleyHouse.16: Cupcakes, milk, a tightly sealed jar of cornichons, and quinoa salad.
content.HaleyHouse.17: To our beloved girls:^We miss you and hope that you are doing okay on your own. We just left the Fern Islands last night, after staying for two months.^It was a wonderful experience... highly recommended.^Make sure you eat healthy and don't forget to pay the electricity bill!^^Love, Mom & Dad
content.HarveyRoom.1: A comparison between fighter planes of the Ferngill Republic and the Gotoro Empire.
content.HarveyRoom.2: There's a beautiful view of the sky above Stardew Valley.
content.HarveyRoom.5: It's a complicated radio broadcasting set.
content.HarveyRoom.6: It's a complicated radio broadcasting set.
content.HarveyRoom.7: There's a tape inside: 'Anthology Of Classic Jazz'
content.HarveyRoom.10: You didn't find anything, and now your hands smell bad.
content.HarveyRoom.14: It's a pretty standard TV set. It's set to the history station.
content.Hospital.1: The sign of the vessel. It's here to comfort those who believe in Yoba.
content.Hospital.2: It's a sample jar. Better not put your fingers in there.
content.Hospital.3: It's probably not a good idea to stick your hands in there. It's full of used syringes, dirty swabs, and little nozzles that Harvey stuck into people's ears.
content.Hospital.4: Is life sometimes difficult? Do you ever have trouble staying focused? Talk to your doctor about Pravoloxinone.^(Pravoloxinone is not for everyone. Side effects may include insomnia, severe anger, uncontrollable swelling of the throat, permanent discoloration of the lips, hair loss, and stroke. In extremely rare cases (1 in 500), test subjects experienced complete disintegration of one or more bones.)
content.JojaMart.2: 'Maple Sauce'... It's a lot like syrup!
content.JojaMart.17: JojaDiet -- Low fat beans! In a sweet sugar-sauce
content.JojaMart.24: White bread, fortified with essential nutrients
content.JojaMart.25: Barbecue smokehouse chips with mesquite flavoring
content.JojaMart.26: JojaDiet -- Low fat beans! In a sweet sugar-sauce
content.JojaMart.51: Powdered breakfast -- Just add water. (Eggs & Potatoes)
content.JojaMart.60: Powdered breakfast -- Just add water. (Eggs & Potatoes)
content.JojaMart.79: Joja Oil -- A proprietary blend of delicious oils. Use it for any purpose.
content.JojaMart.80: Joja Multipurpose Detergent -- Use it for your laundry, for your dishes, to clean your hands, as a shampoo, and even as toothpaste! Mix it with JojaMeal to make a delicious icing.
content.JojaMart.83: Disks and pucks of pure gluten.
content.JojaMart.86: Canned fish... now with teeth whitening sauce.
content.JojaMart.91: Laundry Detergent -- now with 10x the fragrance!
content.JojaMart.94: JojaMeal... It's like corn meal but more versatile. It can be used for baking, thickening and sweetening. Mix it with water to make our signature gravy.
content.JojaMart.95: Carbo cones. Tasty little cone-shaped snacks that will fill your stomach bag.
content.JojaMart.96: Canned fish... now with teeth whitening sauce.
content.JoshHouse.1: Momma-^If you're reading this, it means I've passed on. I'm so sorry you had to go through this. Know that I love you both.^Don't be too upset, I'm with Yoba now. ^My final request: take care of Alex. He needs a family, something stable. He's a good kid.^ Love, ^Clara
content.JoshHouse.2: The radio is set to the oldies station.
content.JoshHouse.7: You peek into Alex's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
content.JoshHouse.8: You peek into Alex's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
content.JoshHouse.9: It's Alex's gridball helmet. Looks like he keeps it polished.
content.JoshHouse.13: 'The Dark Blue Life: A Coal-miner's Memoir'

content.SamHouse.3: Jodi-^Since I'll be coming home soon I want to tell you a few things.^I might not be the same man you remember. I've seen some things out here that have really shaken me up. I've been having a real hard time relaxing.^I don't want to scare you or make you upset. I just don't want you to be shocked when I get back.^Remember, no matter how I act, you and the kids mean everything to me.^I'll see you soon.^-Kent
content.SamHouse.4: It's set to the news station.
content.SamHouse.6: There's a bunch of extra strong hair gel in here.
content.SamHouse.7: There's a bunch of skateboarding magazines.

content.SeedShop.7: 'Journey Of The Prairie King: Console Edition'
content.SeedShop.9: To Mr. Pierre:^It pains me to be the bearer of bad news, but I feel obligated to inform you of a recent development most threatening to your livelihood.^Joja Co. has decided to expand into Pelican Town.^It's too late for protest. Joja Builders have already broken ground for the new JojaMart.^^This must be devastating news for you. So many years in business...a local standby... and now, obscured by the shadow of a powerful, efficient, economically viable corporation. What a shame!^^As manager of the new JojaMart, I feel, to some degree, personally responsible for your predicament. As such, I'd like to offer you a position as Assistant Grocer. Wages start at 5g an hour. I look forward to seeing your resume!^^-Mr. Morris, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart

content.WitchHut.1: Whoever lives here must really like a clean floor!
content.WitchHut.2: It would probably be a bad idea to stick your tender arm in there.
content.WitchHut.3: The bone is probably covered in bacteria. You decide not to touch it.
content.WitchHut.4: You uncork the bottle and waft the odor into your nostrils. The odor is surprisingly pleasant, with hints of apricot and spice berry.
content.WitchHut.5: Curse The Countryside!... A Spellbook For The Rural Witch
content.WitchHut.6: You try not to make eye contact...
content.MovieTheater_CraneMan: Crane Man: Can't talk... I'm in the zone.
content.MovieTheater_CraneOccupied: The crane game is in use by someone else.
content.MovieTheater_Welwick: Welwick: Hmm, not many people here... and I invested a lot of money in this movie!
content.MovieTheater_Welwick2: Welwick: I foresee great things in your future... If you buy lots of tickets to this movie!
content.MovieTheater_ShortsMan: Corner Guy: Brr... it's kind of drafty over here... I'm glad I wore my long pants!
content.MovieTheater_ShortsMan2: Corner Guy: Psst... I just saw the movie, and... Relax! I'm not going to spoil it for you.
content.MovieTheater_Mother: Woman: Simon, don't you want something healthy? *sigh*... okay...
content.MovieTheater_Mother2: Woman: How about some apple slices? No? *sigh*... okay...
content.MovieTheater_Child2: Simon: Mom! I want chocolate popcorn! *slurp*
content.MovieTheater_Lupini: Lupini: Amateurs! The set design was completely mundane!
content.MovieTheater_Lupini2: Lupini: Amateurs! My nephew's 2nd birthday party home video had better cinematography!
content.MovieTheater_ConcessionMan: Moviegoer: Urgh... Too many snack options!
content.MovieTheater_ConcessionMan2: Moviegoer: Ah, look at that popcorn go! Oh, the sounds... the smells!
content.MovieTheater_PurpleHairLady: Woman: Get lost... I'm busy rubbing elbows with the Governor!
content.MovieTheater_RedCapGuy: Man: Uh oh... I think I'm a little overdressed for this place...
content.MovieTheater_RedCapGuy2: Man: I sat in the front row... big mistake.
content.MovieTheater_Governor: Governor: It's lovely to see economic development in the valley!
content.MovieTheater_Governor2: Governor: I really must bring the missus out for soup and a movie!
content.MovieTheater_Gunther: Hey, I'd love to chat, but I need to head back to the museum!
content.MovieTheater_Gunther2: Hey, @. I just saw the movie, myself... not bad!
content.MovieTheater_Marlon: Gil slept through the whole movie... typical.
content.MovieTheater_Marlon2: That was an interesting one... what'd you think, Gil?#$b#...Gil?#$b#...He's out cold.
content.MovieTheater_Marcello: Marcello: What a spread! I think I'll go for the bourbon mayonnaise. Hehe!
content.MovieTheater_Marcello2: Marcello: What a spread! I think I'll go for the 12-grain spicy mustard. Hehe!
content.MovieTheater_Morris: As you can see, the theater is a major success!$h#$b#Whaa...? A return on your investment? Well, it's difficult, you know... might take a while, you understand... *mumble*$2
content.MovieTheater_Morris2: Ah, it's our very important investment partner! Enjoy the show, and don't forget to buy a bag of JojaCorn on your way in!$h
